123.content:
Amber was once a normal girl until one day some crazy scientific organization kidnapped her and subjected her to various experiments.
Unfortunately 2 of their experiments had an unintended effect.


Amber had begun to have growth spurts.
It started out manageable but in the days that followed even after capturing the guilty parties a reversal wasn't forthcoming.


Amber in week outgrew most buildings.
In 2 weeks she outgrew cities
In the 4th week when it seemed her growth spurts would never end they did.


Now Amber is beyond enormous. In fact Amber is so large she can pick up mountains and islands with ease. To her they are bite sized snacks and make up most of her diet. One day while eating a mountain she was given the green light to eat she'd met a boy named Max.



Unfortunately given her size a relationship was next to impossible at least the kind she longed for.
The government continued to seek a cure for her.
Unfortunately Amber was too big for any clothing.


There were few things for Amber to do at this size tho



Your options are

1 > chat


2 > Magical hot springs of shrinkage
Amber unwittingly snacks on an island and volcano home to a mysterious springs that could cure her.
The unfortunate rub at her size the effects will be delayed and there's not enough to work completely in short Amber will only shrink down to a building sized giantess still taller than many buildings


3 > Human needs and a substitute for sex
Island sized pleasure toy
